item.title: How every House member voted on the funding bill
‘Co-president’ Elon Musk? Trump ally tests influence in spending fight
Leaders of federal managers reject Trump’s plans to politicize workforce
item.description: Federal agencies face four years under a president who promised “to remove rogue bureaucrats … very aggressively.”

item.title: Trump’s foes fear his retribution has already begun
item.description: Donald Trump has waffled on his vows to punish enemies from the White House. But many of his critics — and targets — fear the retribution is already u...

item.title: House GOP searches for new plan as government shutdown nears
item.description: Republicans revolted against a bipartisan bill, then the House rejected a party-line alternative. The shutdown deadline is hours away.
